#text=This winter , my family and I decided we wanted to plant a tree in our backyard .
#text=Since it was still the middle of winter , we decided to wait until it was April to plant it because we learned that was the best time of year to do it .
#text=Once April came around , we chose a suitable tree for our area .
#text=With a shovel , we dug a hole that had enough room for the fresh roots to grow .
#text=After that was done , we prepared the tree by gently taking it out of the pot .
#text=Once our tree was ready , we placed it into our freshly dug hole .
#text=Once the tree was properly placed , we refilled the hole with the dirt and soil so that it was securely in place .
#text=We were happy to see our tree all set and watered the tree .
#text=We plan to enjoy watching the tree grow for many years .
